title: Stage Lv4-A6-S21
description: Level 4 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Let's collaborate to complete the project. (business variant 1)
We need to clarify each person's role. (business variant 1)
learning_points: Level 4 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Let's collaborate to complete the project. (business variant 1)
We need to clarify each person's role. (business variant 1)
Who should we assign this task to? (business variant 1)
Teamwork is the key to success. (business variant 1)
We should work by supporting each other. (business variant 1)
All team members can contribute. (business variant 1)
Regular communication is important. (business variant 1)
We have distributed tasks efficiently. (business variant 1)
We should utilize each person's strengths. (business variant 1)
Let's work to achieve team goals. (business variant 1)
